channel.title: Problem making new shop
channel.description:
for reasons of my own i need to make a new shop. well tbh im doing it for a luagh to see if i cna get it to work. but heres the problem:whenever i try to trade the drogo dwarf it dissconnects me. pic of server box: [IMG]http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e286/snakeman2058/help4.jpg[/img]
and heres my code in shops.config [code]shop = 41 Back_Ally_Druggie 2 2 1633 15 970 10 267 10[/code] in client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 579) { //druggie shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41;[/code] and in autospawn.config [code]spawn = 579 3197 3389 0 2817 3463 2815 3461 2 Drug Pusher[/code]

item.title: Problem making new shop
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

are you sure you tabbed the shop items?? instead of spacing? also make sure that you change you max shop limit and npc limit to 1000 also make sure that the npc isnt out of bounds and it in a spot where every one can walk

Read full topic

for reasons of my own i need to make a new shop. well tbh im doing it for a luagh to see if i cna get it to work. but heres the problem:whenever i try to trade the drogo dwarf it dissconnects me. pic of server box:

and heres my code
in shops.config

shop = 41	Back_Ally_Druggie				2	2	1633	15	970	10	267	10

in client.java
